description: This is one of a handful of prototype Gelgoogs produced for testing purposes. As usual, Char Aznable has tuned it to his own specifications and given it his trademark color scheme. At the controls of this prototype Gelgoog, the famed "Red Comet" battles the Gundam at the Texas colony, and subsequently uses it to escort Lalah Sune`s mobile armor Elmeth into combat.
name: Gelgoog Custom
